EmailTemplate.description: Data Services - Quickstart - Third Party Login
EmailTemplate.name: Data Services - Quickstart - Third Party Login
EmailTemplate.subject: Data Services - Quickstart - Third Party Login
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Data Conversion Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We have received your company file(s) for data conversion. However, the file(s) uploaded is/are password protected and we are unable to access your data to begin the data conversion. We attempted to call you on [DATE] but were unable to reach you. Please send an email to icu_status@intuit.com with the best time to reach you by phone to obtain the login credentials for your file(s).
We sincerely regret the inconvenience this has caused!
Thank you, Intuit Data Services
This is an automated email. Please do not reply directly as you will not receive a response
